title: The "Seven Salty Almonds, Six-Pointed Stars, Five Secret Emails" Edition
description:
Emily Bazelon, John Dickerson and David Plotz discuss Hillary Clinton's
trustworthiness ratings, Donald Trump's use of Jewish star-shaped
stars, and President Obama's nightly routines.
